# disabled(_:)

**Instance Method**

Controls whether users can interact with this tab.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated func disabled(_ disabled: Bool) -> some TabContent<Self.TabValue>

```

## Parameters

- **disabled**: A Boolean value that determines whether users can interact with this tab.

## Discussion

The following example shows a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/TabView] with one tab that is not selectable.

```swift
TabView {
    Tab("Home", systemImage: "house") {
        HomeView()
    }
    Tab("Alerts", systemImage: "bell") {
        AlertsView()
    }
    .disabled(alertsDisabled)
}
```
